levels.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and <$ba.root>Binds</> them for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds. If the trap hits only <@ba.vup>1</> target, <$ba.root>Binds</> them for <@ba.vup>{duration_2}</> seconds instead
Active Effect: Immediately gain 1 trap
